data.title: Director Krish Ropes In Mishti Chakraborty
data.meta_description: Mishti Chakraborty, the Bengali born actress who made her debut with Subhash Ghais film Kaanchi The Unbreakable, was also seen in Telugu movies She acted in Chinnadhana Nee Kosam and Columbus The...
data.text:
Mishti Chakraborty, the Bengali born actress who made her debut with Subhash Ghai's film Kaanchi: The Unbreakable, was also seen in Telugu movies. She acted in Chinnadhana Nee Kosam and Columbus. The actress is now in consideration to play a key role in director Krish's next movie.

Director Krish who is planning to undergo a reshoot for his next movie Manikarnika has brought Mishti on board to play a key role. Her role is said to have a lot of significance in the script. Vijayendra Prasad penned the script for the movie. Kangana Ranaut is playing the title role in the movie.

Earlier, Mishti acted in Kumar's Great Grand Masti, and Begum Jaan.

On the other side, Krish is simultaneously working on NTR's biopic titled NTR.
